Dialogue.Page: A dark shadowy world. Were it not for intermittent flashes of lightning, it would be largely invisible against the background of space.
Unfortunately, this world is so nebulous and mysterious that even a Hearthian ship log cannot record data on it.
Until ship logs can be obtained, we can learn nothing new here. Perhaps my Hearthian friend could <color="orange">modify</color> their ship in order to remedy this?
(Bird refuses to add ship logs to their mod; ensure you have the Symbiosis Ship Logs mod by GameWyrm installed to track your progress here!)
A dark shadowy world. Were it not for intermittent flashes of lightning, it would be largely invisible against the background of space.
Unfortunately, this world is so nebulous and mysterious that even a Hearthian ship log cannot record data on it.
Thankfully my Hearthian friend was able to install a <color="orange">modification</color> to their ship log, enabling us to record data on this world.
A dark shadowy world. Were it not for intermittent flashes of lightning, it would be largely invisible against the background of space.
Unfortunately, this world is so nebulous and mysterious that even a Hearthian ship log cannot record data on it.
Thankfully my Hearthian friend was able to install a <color="orange">modification</color> to their ship log, enabling us to record data on this world.

It seems however that their findings have left us with more questions than answers: Where did this "spokesperson" come from, what was their purpose, and why does this "Ernesto" character keep popping up everywhere?
I took this plant cutting from the planet. Apparently it causes hallucinations within my Hearthian friend, but it has no effect on me.
